title: Some Champs just need to be deleted
body:
I really want to see what criteria riot has to decide if a champion is 'broken' because i see them nerfing so many champions out of the game every patch and then i get on and count myself lucky if i don't have to lane against a Fizz or Yasuo. 

These champions are the ones in need of true nerfing, even removal from the game altogether, because i don't see how a champion that has 1 small part of the kit that yasuo or fizz has and they are labeled broken and nerfed. 

I would just like to summarize my opinion of why they are broken feel free to make suggestions or disagree if you believe i am wrong:

**Fizz**
every midlaners worst nightmare
fizz combines crazy mobility with super high damage and untargetability, and as such the only way to kill him is to outsustain him till he goes oom.

**Yasuo**
The annoying champ mained by 60+ % of COE and isnt even restricted to midlane
Yasuo has a kit that makes a support cry, when your crazy high damage 100% crit chance mid laner provides more kill and teamfigjht potential than your supp you know there is something not right.

replies.body: they are not broken lol. Maybe in low elo they are because nobody knows how to peel.
I want a non ranked Draft mode so i can ban Yasuo every game ;)
Yes yasuo and fizz are broken and yes they have been nerfed enough, its just people cant seem to grasp that if you dont focus him in a teamfight then he will destroy your team.

That's why we play Draf..
oh, Have fun in blind pick :)
